cards.title: Greyhat
powers: Discard a card. Search your deck for a Link card and put it in hand. Shuffle your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

cards.title: Coerced Uplink
body: Play this card next to a non-Hero target.
When this card enters play, {Greyhat} deals that target 1 Lightning Damage and you may draw a card.

cards.title: Digital Uplink
body: Play this card next to a Hero other than {Greyhat}.
When this card enters play, that Hero may use a power and you may draw a card.

cards.title: Deployed Relay
body: At the end of your turn, you may search your Trash for a Link and put it into play.

cards.title: Instant Firewall
body: At the end of your turn, {Greyhat} deals each non-Hero target 1 Fire Damage.

cards.title: Proxy Pod
body: At the end of your turn, this card regains 2 HP.

cards.title: Direct Control
body: {Greyhat} and each Hero next to a Link in their play area uses a power.
Each non-Hero Target next to a Link deals themselves 3 Energy Damage.

cards.title: Shock Therapy
body: {Greyhat} and each Hero next to a Link regains 2 HP.
{Greyhat} deals each non-Hero Target next to a Link deals 3 Lightning Damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You may feel a slight tingle.

promoCards.title: Greyhat
powers: Draw a card. One target next to a Link deals 1 Target 1 Sonic Damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: This place's aura is unique. I won't have you disturbing it.
